alert.note: Alert for Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 1:55PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Flagler, southeastern St. Johns and southeastern Putnam Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 155 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Andalusia, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palm Coast, Flagler Beach, Bunnell, Crescent City, Pomona Park, East Palatka, Andalusia, Marineland, Crescent Beach and San Mateo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns
